price: Kuma Muka bã shi Ishãƙa da Ya'aƙũba, kuma Muka sanya Annabci da littãfi a cikin zuriyarsa. Kuma Mun bã shi sakamakonsa a dũniya, kuma lalle shĩ a Lãhira, tabbas, yanã a cikin sãlihai.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِي ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ أَجۡرَهُۥ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wajaʿalnā fī dhurriyyatihi al-nubuwata wal-kitāba waātaynāhu ajrahu fī al-dun'yā wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
